Deploying a project tag

Deploying a version tag to an environment will replace all forms, resources, roles, actions and access settings with the ones in the version tag.

This is used for migrating a project from one environment to another. First create a new version tag from the source environment and then deploy it into the target environment. This allows for performing a
Dev -> Stage -> Prod deployment strategy.

To deploy a version tag, select the version tag you would like to deploy and click the Deploy button.
